name: Eternity (Chained Horse Studio)
description:
Control 2 Characters at the same time and save their sanity, their fate is in your hands!

You play as The Bound Couples, White and Red have been through a lot of traumatic experience in their life. But their love for each other is endless, and inspire each other to overcome the impossible. Inside their head is a big cloud of static noise trying to separate and kill them. It's up into your hands to lead the Couple to salvation and peace of mind.

HOW TO PLAY

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

SPACE - Toggle Safe Zone Indicator ON and OFF

GAMEPLAY TUTORIAL

Every time the game starts, you will get a chance to choose your main character to have a default movement controls, the 2nd character will have an Inverted horizontal movement in the process.

The goal of the game is to lead the The Couple to the Exit while keeping them both safe inside the Safe Zone. The Couple will take damage if the other partner go too far above or below 3 blocks distance as they will get exposed to the static noise. 

To see the safe zone, press the Space Bar to see the area of effect of the safe zone. The safe zone is indicated with a Red Aura on the floor.

The Game will end if either of the Couple reaches their Health Points to zero, indicating they have died in the process.

You can Recover your Health by standing still on a live heart.

Beware of enemies as they take more damage than going outside of the Safe Zone, also you cannot fight them, you can only escape by passing through them.
